description: You can channel divine energy more often.

sections.text: You can channel energy two additional times per day.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: If a paladin with the ability to channel positive energy takes this feat, she can use lay on hands four additional times per day, but only to channel positive energy. If a warpriest with the ability to channel energy takes this feat, he gains four additional uses of fervor per day, but can use them only to channel energy.
sections.name: Special

name: Extra Channel
